next_seo.description: Sepris is an online platform for car rental in Iran, connecting local car owners to renters. Find your ideal rental car and book with confidence.

toast_message: Your request has been submitted. We will notify you of the result via SMS when the host responds to your request.
location_text: In Tehran area; the car will be delivered to you at your location.
location_text_karaj: In Tehran/Karaj area; the car will be delivered to you at your location.
with_driver_text: This car can only be rented with driver.
with_and_without_driver_text: This car can be rented with or without driver.
extra_text: The payment should be made after the host accepts your request.
